import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client'; import './index.css'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; const App = () => { const [isTopBarVisible, setIsTopBarVisible] = useState(true); const [lastScrollY, setLastScrollY] = useState(0); const [currentNewsSlide, setCurrentNewsSlide] = useState(0); // Sample news data const newsData = [ { id: 1, date: "December 15, 2024", title: "Annual Recognition Day 2024", description: "Join us in celebrating the achievements of our outstanding students during the Annual Recognition Day ceremony.", image: "recognition-day.jpg" }, { id: 2, date: "December 10, 2024", title: "New Computer Laboratory Opening", description: "State-of-the-art computer laboratory equipped with the latest technology for IT students.", image: "computer-lab.jpg" }, { id: 3, date: "December 5, 2024", title: "Sports Festival 2024", description: "Annual sports festival featuring various athletic competitions and team building activities.", image: "sports-festival.jpg" }, { id: 4, date: "November 28, 2024", title: "Research Symposium 2024", description: "Showcasing innovative research projects from our students and faculty members.", image: "research-symposium.jpg" }, { id: 5, date: "November 20, 2024", title: "Career Fair 2024", description: "Connect with leading employers and explore exciting career opportunities.", image: "career-fair.jpg" }, { id: 6, date: "November 15, 2024", title: "Cultural Festival 2024", description: "Celebrating diversity and cultural heritage through music, dance, and art exhibitions.", image: "cultural-festival.jpg" } ]; // Auto-advance carousel with progress useEffect(() => { if (isCarouselHovered) return; const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentNewsSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % Math.ceil(newsData.length / 3)); setProgress(0); }, 5000); // Change slide every 5 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [newsData.length, isCarouselHovered]); // Progress animation useEffect(() => { if (isCarouselHovered) return; const progressInterval = setInterval(() => { setProgress((prev) => { if (prev >= 100) return 0; return prev + 2; }); }, 100); return () => clearInterval(progressInterval); }, [isCarouselHovered]); // Pause auto-advance on hover const [isCarouselHovered, setIsCarouselHovered] = useState(false); const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0); // Scroll-based navbar visibility useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const currentScrollY = window.scrollY; if (currentScrollY > lastScrollY && currentScrollY > 100) { // Scrolling down and past initial 100px setIsTopBarVisible(false); } else if (currentScrollY < lastScrollY && currentScrollY < 50) { // Scrolling up and almost at the top (within 50px) setIsTopBarVisible(true); } setLastScrollY(currentScrollY); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll, { passive: true }); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, [lastScrollY]); // Carousel navigation functions const nextSlide = () => { setCurrentNewsSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % Math.ceil(newsData.length / 3)); }; const prevSlide = () => { setCurrentNewsSlide((prev) => (prev - 1 + Math.ceil(newsData.length / 3)) % Math.ceil(newsData.length / 3)); }; const goToSlide = (index) => { setCurrentNewsSlide(index); }; // Get current slide news items const getCurrentSlideNews = () => { const startIndex = currentNewsSlide * 3; return newsData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + 3); }; return (
{/* Home Section */}
{/*

Explore Programs Apply Now
{/* Academic Programs Section */}

Academic Programs

Discover our comprehensive range of academic programs designed to prepare you for success

Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

Develop essential business skills and knowledge for leadership roles in various industries.

  • Financial Management
  • Marketing Management
  • Human Resource Management
  • Operations Management

Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

Master the latest technologies and prepare for careers in the digital world.

  • Software Development
  • Database Management
  • Network Administration
  • Web Development

Bachelor of Science in Education

Shape the future by becoming an educator and inspiring the next generation.

  • Elementary Education
  • Secondary Education
  • Special Education
  • Physical Education

Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management

Excel in the dynamic world of hospitality and tourism management.

  • Hotel Operations
  • Food and Beverage
  • Tourism Management
  • Event Planning
Learn More About Academic Programs
{/* Admissions Section */}

Admissions

Start your journey towards academic excellence

Admission Requirements

  • Completed Application Form
  • High School Diploma or Equivalent
  • Official Transcript of Records
  • Certificate of Good Moral Character
  • Medical Certificate
  • 2x2 ID Pictures (4 copies)
  • Birth Certificate (NSO/PSA)

Application Process

1

Submit Application

Complete and submit your application form with all required documents

2

Entrance Examination

Take the college entrance examination on the scheduled date

3

Interview

Attend the scheduled interview with the admissions committee

4

Enrollment

Complete enrollment procedures and pay necessary fees

Learn More About Admissions
{/* News & Events Section */}

News & Events

Stay updated with the latest happenings at City College of Bayawan

setIsCarouselHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsCarouselHovered(false)} >
